statements: SELECT student_name, instrument FROM student_registration
SELECT * FROM student_registration WHERE student_id = 1
SELECT student_name, enrollment_date FROM student_registration ORDER BY enrollment_date DESC
SELECT student_name, enrollment_date FROM student_registration WHERE enrollment_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT DISTINCT instrument FROM student_registration
SELECT student_id, student_name, enrollment_date, instrument FROM student_registration WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT student_name, instrument FROM student_registration WHERE enrollment_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM student_registration WHERE instrument = 'Piano' ORDER BY enrollment_date DESC;
SELECT student_id, student_name FROM student_registration WHERE enrollment_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT COUNT(student_id) AS total_students FROM student_registration WHERE instrument IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM students
SELECT student_id, student_name, email FROM students WHERE date_of_birth >= '2000-01-01'
SELECT student_name, email FROM students WHERE student_id IN (1, 3, 5)
SELECT student_name, date_of_birth FROM students ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC
SELECT * FROM enrollments WHERE enrollment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31'
SELECT student_name, date_of_birth FROM students WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT student_name, email FROM students WHERE date_of_birth < '2000-01-01';
SELECT * FROM students JOIN enrollments ON students.student_id = enrollments.student_id;
SELECT student_name, enrollment_date FROM students JOIN enrollments ON students.student_id = enrollments.student_id WHERE students.student_id = 2;
SELECT student_name, course_id FROM students JOIN enrollments ON students.student_id = enrollments.student_id WHERE students.date_of_birth BETWEEN '1990-01-01' AND '1995-12-31';
SELECT * FROM Students;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM Students;
SELECT course_name, instructor, schedule FROM Courses;
SELECT student_id, course_id, enrollment_date FROM Enrollments;
SELECT first_name, last_name, course_name, enrollment_date FROM Students JOIN Enrollments ON Students.student_id = Enrollments.student_id JOIN Courses ON Enrollments.course_id = Courses.course_id;
SELECT * FROM Students WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM Students WHERE instrument = 'Piano' ORDER BY last_name DESC;
SELECT course_name, instructor, schedule FROM Courses WHERE schedule LIKE '%Monday%' ORDER BY course_name;

SELECT Students.first_name, Students.last_name, Courses.course_name FROM Students JOIN Enrollments ON Students.student_id = Enrollments.student_id JOIN Courses ON Enrollments.course_id = Courses.course_id WHERE Students.instrument = 'Guitar';
SELECT COUNT(student_id) AS total_students, instructor FROM Courses GROUP BY instructor HAVING total_students > 5 ORDER BY total_students DESC;
SELECT * FROM Students;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM Students WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT course_name, instructor, credit_hours FROM Courses WHERE credit_hours > 3;
SELECT student_id, grade FROM Grades WHERE grade = 'A';
SELECT * FROM Registrations WHERE registration_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Students;
SELECT student_id, first_name, last_name, email FROM Students WHERE enrollment_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT course_name, instructor FROM Courses WHERE credit_hours > 3 ORDER BY course_name ASC;

SELECT Students.first_name, Courses.course_name, Registrations.registration_date FROM Students JOIN Registrations ON Students.student_id = Registrations.student_id JOIN Courses ON Registrations.course_id = Courses.course_id WHERE Students.last_name = 'Smith';
SELECT student_id, grade FROM Grades WHERE grade = 'A' ORDER BY student_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM Students;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM Students WHERE registration_date = '2022-01-15';
SELECT course_name, instructor, credits FROM Courses WHERE credits > 3;
SELECT student_id, course_id, enrollment_date FROM Enrollments WHERE grade = 'A';
SELECT location, capacity FROM Classrooms ORDER BY capacity DESC;
SELECT * FROM Students WHERE registration_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM Students WHERE last_name LIKE 'S%' ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT course_name, instructor, schedule, credits FROM Courses WHERE credits > 3 ORDER BY course_name DESC;

SELECT Students.first_name, Courses.course_name, Enrollments.enrollment_date FROM Students JOIN Enrollments ON Students.student_id = Enrollments.student_id JOIN Courses ON Courses.course_id = Enrollments.course_id WHERE Students.first_name = 'Alice';

SELECT Classrooms.location, Schedule.day_of_week, TIME_FORMAT(Schedule.start_time, '%h:%i %p') AS start_time_formatted FROM Classrooms JOIN Schedule ON Classrooms.classroom_id = Schedule.classroom_id WHERE location = 'Building A' ORDER BY Schedule.day_of_week ASC, start_time_formatted ASC;
